name: Streadata.io API Gallery - Snippets
description: This is a repository of snippets APIs, self-contained as a Github repository, with HTML and YAML representations of the APIs and their surrounding operations.

apis.name: glot.io
apis.description: glot.io lets you run and share snippets. Snippets can be saved as either public or secret. Public snippets will show up in /snippets and will be found by search engines. Secret snippets can only be accessed by those who know the url. Code is executed inside a temporary container without a network connection. Execution time is limited to 15 seconds and the output can not exceed 100KiB.

apis.name: Bitbucket
apis.description: Collaborate on code with inline comments and pull requests. Manage and share your Git repositories to build and ship software, as a team.

apis.name: GitLab
apis.description: GitLab is a web-based Git-repository manager with wiki, issue-tracking and CI/CD pipelines features, using an open-source license, developed by GitLab Inc.
